full_summary:
**High Vacuum Cool Magnetron Sputter and Carbon Coating System**
==========================================================

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the acquisition of a High Vacuum Cool Magnetron Sputter and Carbon Coating System. The Quality Engineering Test Establishment (QETE) requires a reliable and efficient system to support its failure investigation and analysis services in the domains of mechanical and materials engineering, applied science, electrical engineering, measurement science, and imagery.

**Request for Proposal Information**

* Solicitation Number: W8486-249248/A
* Publication Date: 2023-12-06
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-15T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-15
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-31
* Tender Status: Expired

The proposed system will be used to investigate and analyze mechanical and materials failures, and will be a critical tool for the QETE 2-2 Failure and Accident Investigations Group. The successful bidder will be responsible for the delivery, installation, and maintenance of the system, including 5 additional 1-year periods for maintenance options.

**Contract Requirements**

* Delivery and installation of the system at the QETE Supply Warehouse, NPB Building, 45 Blvd Sacré Coeur, Room C1113, Ramp 7, Gatineau, QC, J8X 1C6
* Maintenance of the system, including 5 additional 1-year periods for maintenance options
* Compliance with all relevant laws, regulations, and standards

**Proposal Submission**

Proposals must be submitted in either English or French and must include all required documentation. The department encourages bidders to familiarize themselves with the contract requirements and to contact the Contracting Authority for any inquiries.
